title: Role Selection Screen Loads Correctly
description: Verify that the role selection screen displays options for Guest and Owner and allows selection.

steps.description: Launch the app and wait for splash screen to complete initialization
Verify that the role selection screen is shown
Verify that both Guest and Owner roles are presented as selectable options
Select Guest role
Verify the selection is registered and user can proceed to authentication flow

title: Authentication via Phone OTP Success
description: Verify user can authenticate successfully using phone number with OTP for both Guest and Owner roles.

steps.description: Select role (Guest or Owner) on role selection screen
Navigate to phone authentication screen
Enter valid phone number
Request OTP and receive it
Input correct OTP
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to corresponding dashboard

title: Authentication via Phone OTP Failure on Incorrect OTP
description: Verify user cannot authenticate if an incorrect OTP is entered and appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Select role (Guest or Owner)
Navigate to phone authentication screen
Enter valid phone number
Request OTP
Input incorrect OTP
Verify authentication fails with an error message indicating invalid OTP

title: Authentication via Google Sign-in Success
description: Verify user can authenticate successfully using Google Sign-in for both roles.

steps.description: Select role (Guest or Owner)
Click on Google Sign-in button
Complete Google Sign-in flow with valid Google account
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to correct dashboard

title: Authentication via Apple Sign-in Success
description: Verify user can authenticate successfully using Apple Sign-in on supported devices.

steps.description: Select role (Guest or Owner)
Click on Apple Sign-in button
Complete Apple Sign-in flow with valid Apple ID
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to correct dashboard

title: Guest Dashboard - Browse PG Listings with Search
description: Verify guest users can browse PG listings, use advanced search filters, and view full listing details.

steps.description: Authenticate as Guest user
Navigate to guest PG listings screen
Verify listings are displayed with correct details including photos and amenities
Use advanced search filters (e.g., location, price, amenities)
Verify filtered listings match criteria
Select a PG listing to view details
Verify PG details show correct information, photos, and food menu

title: Guest Booking - Successful Booking with Real-time Availability
description: Verify a guest can successfully book a bed in a PG showing real-time availability without conflicts.

steps.description: Authenticate as Guest user
Navigate to a PG listing with available beds
Verify availability is shown accurately for beds
Initiate booking process and select available bed
Complete booking form and confirm booking
Verify booking is successful and availability is updated accordingly

title: Guest Booking - Booking Rejected on No Availability
description: Verify booking attempt fails gracefully when a selected bed is no longer available and shows appropriate message.

steps.description: Authenticate as Guest user
Navigate to a PG listing where beds are fully booked
Attempt to book a bed
Verify attempt to book a fully booked bed fails with user-friendly error message

title: Guest Dashboard - Food Menu Viewing
description: Verify guest can view available food menu, navigate food categories, and view item details.

steps.description: Authenticate as Guest
Go to food menu section from PG listing or guest dashboard
Verify food items for selected PG are displayed with photos and descriptions
Select food category
Verify items filter according to category
Select a food item to view details
Verify detailed food item information is displayed

title: Guest Dashboard - Payment Tracking
description: Verify guest can view payment history, payment statuses, and billing details.

steps.description: Authenticate as Guest
Navigate to payments section on guest dashboard
Verify payment list shows all past transactions with correct status
Select a payment to view detailed billing information
Verify billing details are accurate and match backend records

title: Guest Dashboard - Complaint Submission and Status Tracking
description: Verify guests can submit complaints and track their statuses with notifications on updates.

steps.description: Authenticate as Guest
Navigate to complaints section
Submit a new complaint with required details
Verify complaint is recorded and visible in complaint list with 'Open' status
Simulate complaint status update (e.g. through backend or owner action)
Verify guest receives notification and complaint status updates in real-time

title: Owner Dashboard - CRUD Operations on PG Properties
description: Verify that owners can create, read, update, and delete PG properties, floors, rooms, and beds.

steps.description: Authenticate as Owner
Navigate to PG management screen
Create a new PG property with all fields filled
Verify the new PG property is listed
Add floors, rooms, and beds to the PG property
Verify all additions are visible and editable
Update PG property details and save
Verify updates persist and are shown correctly
Delete a room or bed from PG property configuration
Verify deletion is confirmed and no longer visible in UI or backend

title: Owner Dashboard - Manage Guest Bookings and Approvals
description: Verify owner can view guest bookings, approve or reject requests, and track check-in and check-out.

steps.description: Authenticate as Owner
Navigate to guest management screen
Verify list of guest bookings is displayed with correct information
Select a pending booking request
Approve the booking request
Verify booking status changes to approved and user is notified
Select another booking request and reject it
Verify booking status changes to rejected and user is notified
Mark a guest check-in and check-out
Verify guest status updates correctly and records are consistent

title: Owner Dashboard - Financial Metrics and Analytics Reports
description: Verify owner can view revenue, expenses, payments, occupancy rate, and generate correct analytic reports.

steps.description: Authenticate as Owner
Navigate to overview analytics screen
Verify revenue, expenses, payments, and occupancy data are displayed and pulled from backend
Generate revenue projection report
Verify generated report data matches backend records and calculations

title: Multi-language Support - English and Telugu
description: Verify app interface adapts correctly between English and Telugu including formatting of dates and numbers.

steps.description: Launch app and authenticate as Guest
Set app language to English in preferences
Verify all UI elements and labels display text in English
Toggle app language to Telugu
Verify all UI text changes to Telugu accurately with correct locale specific formats

title: Theme Switching - Light and Dark Mode
description: Verify user can toggle between light mode, dark mode, and system default themes and UI updates accordingly.

steps.description: Launch app and authenticate
Open settings and select light theme
Verify UI colors render in light mode throughout all app screens
Switch theme setting to dark mode
Verify UI updates to dark mode colors seamlessly
Select system default theme
Verify app theme changes dynamically based on system settings

title: Secure Data Storage and Transmission
description: Verify that user data is encrypted in transit and at rest and cannot be accessed without authorization.

steps.description: Authenticate as a user and perform actions involving sensitive data (e.g. payments, profile updates)
Verify network requests contain encrypted data using HTTPS/TLS
Verify sensitive data stored locally is encrypted using secure storage
Attempt to access protected data without authentication or with invalid credentials
Verify unauthorized access is denied and does not expose sensitive information

title: Interactive PG Floor Map Rendering and Updates
description: Verify owner dashboard renders multi-floor, room, bed maps interactively with accurate status and allows updates.

steps.description: Authenticate as Owner
Navigate to floor management widget of a multi-floor PG property
Verify floor map is rendered with rooms and beds visually displayed
Verify bed statuses correspond to real-time data (booked, vacant, maintenance)
Update bed status and save changes
Verify the updates reflect visually and persist in backend

title: Push Notification Delivery and Handling
description: Verify that app receives real-time notifications for payments, complaints, bookings, and status updates.

steps.description: Authenticate as Guest and Owner in separate devices
Trigger backend event for payment confirmation, booking approval, or complaint update
Verify relevant user receives push notification timely with correct content
Tap the notification to open the app
Verify app navigates to the related screen and displays updated data

title: Performance - App Launch Time Under 3 Seconds
description: Verify app loads and transition from splash to main dashboard within 3 seconds on supported devices.

steps.description: Launch app on supported iOS and Android devices under normal network conditions
Measure time from app start to user seeing dashboard screen
Verify total load time is less than or equal to 3 seconds

title: Performance - API Response Times Under 2 Seconds
description: Verify backend API responses for booking, payments, and property management complete within 2 seconds.

steps.description: Perform various API requests (e.g. fetch PG listings, create booking, update payment status)
Measure response time for each API call
Verify all response times are less than or equal to 2 seconds

title: Navigation - Role-Based and Nested Routing
description: Verify that navigation routes are correctly restricted and nested by user role and app section.

steps.description: Authenticate as Guest
Attempt to navigate to Owner-only dashboard screens via URL or deep link
Verify user is redirected or access denied to Owner dashboard
Authenticate as Owner
Navigate through nested routes for PG management, including multi-floor views
Verify all nested screens load correctly and navigation back works without errors

title: Complaint System - Concurrent Updates Handling
description: Verify that simultaneous complaint updates by owner and guest do not cause data conflicts or loss.

steps.description: Log in simultaneously as Guest and Owner on different devices
Guest submits a complaint
Owner updates complaint status concurrently while Guest views the complaint
Verify complaint status updates in real-time for Guest without data inconsistency
Both try to update complaint notes concurrently
Verify system prevents conflicting overwrites and merges changes accurately

title: Localization - Date and Number Format Accuracy
description: Verify dates, currencies, and numbers are formatted correctly for English and Telugu locales.

steps.description: Set app language to English
Navigate to payments and booking detail screens
Verify dates appear in DD/MM/YYYY or locale appropriate English format
Verify currency and number values appear correctly
Set app language to Telugu
Verify dates and numbers appear formatted correctly for Telugu locale

title: Data Encryption Verification at Rest and Transit
description: Verify all sensitive user data is encrypted when stored locally and during transmission to backend.

steps.description: Authenticate and perform data operations involving sensitive information
Verify local storage data related to sensitive info is encrypted (using secure storage)
Capture network traffic and verify all communication uses encrypted protocols (TLS/SSL)
